question: The members of the Rajya Sabha are
option1: directly elected by the people on the basis of universal adult franchise
option2: elected by the members of the state legislative assemblies
option3: elected by the members of the state legislative councils
option4: elected by the members of the state legislative councils and state legislative assemblies
answer: elected by the members of the state legislative assemblies
explanation: Members of Rajya Sabha are elected by the elected members of the Assemblies of States and Union territories in accordance with the system of proportional representation by means of the single transferable vote.
